name: Snake Charmer (Overtired_FOX)
description:
>>A free short visual novel made in a few days for the Yaoi Game Jam 2020<<

***

Til was a young snake charmer who lived peacefully until the day when I brought a wounded snake at this place... But he didn't know that this snake was actually the prince who ran away from his kingdom...

***

Programming/Drawing: Overtired_Fox

Writing: amana_fox

Tester: Billy

***
